#define ll long long int
ll a[1000100],b[1000100];
int main()
{
	int T,glass_count,glass_f,n;cin>>T;
	while(T--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		glass_count=0;glass_f=0;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			scanf("%lld %lld",&a[i],&b[i]);	
		}
		sort(a,a+n);sort(b,b+n);
		int t=0;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			ll p=a[i];
			while(t<n&&p>=b[t]) glass_f++,t++;
			if(glass_f>0) glass_f--;
			else
			{
				glass_count++;
			}
		}		
		cout<<glass_count<<endl;
	}
}
